name: J.K. Rowling
intro: British author, best known for the Harry Potter series.
bio: J.K. Rowling is the author of the Harry Potter series, which has won multiple awards and sold over 500 million copies worldwide.

name: George R.R. Martin
intro: American novelist and short story writer, known for the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series.
bio: George R.R. Martin is the author of the popular 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, which has been adapted into the television series 'Game of Thrones'.

name: Agatha Christie
intro: Renowned British author of mystery novels.
bio: Agatha Christie is known for her detective novels and short stories, particularly those featuring Hercule Poirot and Miss Marple.

name: Stephenie Meyer
intro: American author best known for the Twilight series.
bio: Stephenie Meyer is an American author, best known for the Twilight series.

name: Stan Lee
intro: American comic book writer and editor.
bio: Stan Lee was an American comic book writer, editor, and publisher.

name: Gosho Aoyama
intro: Japanese manga artist, creator of Detective Conan.
bio: Gosho Aoyama is a Japanese manga artist known for his work on Detective Conan.

name: Eiichiro Oda
intro: Japanese manga artist, creator of One Piece.
bio: Eiichiro Oda is a Japanese manga artist, known for his popular series One Piece.
